message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.CG, cs.DM 

Reasoning: 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is the most likely category as the paper deals with coding theory and the study of parameters and features of codes. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses local correcting algorithms and recursive formulae. 
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is a possible category as the paper may involve complexity analysis of the algorithms and codes. 
- cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is a possible category as the paper deals with affine and projective spaces. 
- cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) is a possible category as the paper involves the study of polynomials and their properties.
